Description: If you want to buy it now,please click hereFeatures:1.QQ Watch has US version and EU version. US version runs on GSM 850/1900. It works in USA, Canada, Mexico, Argentina, Brazil and some American countries. EU version runs on GSM 900/1800. It works in most countries in Africa, Europe, Middle East,Oceania and Asia (apart from Japan, South Korea). 2.QQ Watch only supports GSM 2G Nano SIM card. Data plan is required. US just support the SIM card of T-Mobile. 3.Add up to 5 families and 16 friends on the app. QQ Watch automatically syncs contacts. You can make and receive calls easily. 4.Track your childs precise location within 3 meters. Press the SOS button to text family members and call the watch admin in case of emergency. Set up a safety zone on the app. Families members receive notifications when your child steps outside the safety zone. 5.Other functions: Group chat, take photos, voice message, text message, add friends, pedometer, alarm, history path, weather, etc.Specifications: Brand: TencentModel: PQ708CPU: MTK6260D2G GSM Network: EU version-900/1800MHz, US version-850/1900MHzSystem: Android and IOSColor: YELLOWWaterproof: IP65 levelTracking: Camera + WIFI + GPS + LBS + Gravity sensorCommunication: Two-way conversation (16+5 members) /Group chat/Friend /MonitorWIFI chip: MT5931Pedometer: Freescale-9555LGPS: U-BLOX-7020K7SIM holder: Pin Mic: FPC+Silicon mic Motor: FPC+Motor Speaker: Speaker+FPC Charging method: Magnetic adsorption chargingConnection: Bluetooth, appSensor: MPU6880 6 axis sensor (3 axis optional)Battery life: 3-8 daysFunctions: Voice calling, GPS tracking, SOS, safety zone, take photos, voice message, text message, group chat, pedometer, history path, weather, alarm, etc.Watch Language: English, Spanish, Italian, French, Russian, PortugueseAPP Language: English, Spanish, Italian, French, Russian, Portuguese, German, Polish, Chinese, Malay, VietnameseScreen: 1.22inchScreen resolution : 240 × 240 PixelsPackage Includes:1 × Tencent QQ Watch1 × USB cable1 × Screw driver 1 × Penguine Egg Case1 × Instruction Payment-We only accept Paypal payment from verified accounts with confirmed address.-Parcels will be shipped after receiving cleared payment.
